column4: Hi! I tried to replace grub with grub2 (for cooler looks) and it did some terrible things and the kernel can't load
I'm now using easy bcd to load the vista bcd (only xp and ubuntu installed though)
boot the live-cd and run "fixit" or "rescue" or whatever it's called,  you'll get the option to restore grub
yeah, should be in the boot menu
